org.keycloak.models

Interface OAuth2DeviceTokenStoreProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Provider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InfinispanOAuth2DeviceTokenStoreProvider

    public interface OAuth2DeviceTokenStoreProvider
extends Provider
    Provides cache for OAuth2 Device Authorization Grant tokens.
    Author:
    Hiroyuki Wada

        Approve the given user code
